<<<<<<< HEAD
Reall thankfulnesse, or, A sermon preached in Pauls church, London, vpon the second day of November, 1645 at a publike thanksgiving for the taking in of the towns and castles of Caermarthen and Mounmouth in Wales, it being the first Lords-day after the inauguration of the Right Honourable Thomas Adams, now lord major of that famous city / by Simeon Ash ... Ashe, Simeon, d. 1662.
[4], 27 p.
Printed by G. Miller for Edward Brewster ..., London : 1645.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
=======
Reall thankfulnesse, or, A sermon preached in Pauls church, London, vpon the second day of November, 1645 at a publike thanksgiving for the taking in of the towns and castles of Caermarthen and Mounmouth in Wales, it being the first Lords-day after the inauguration of the Right Honourable Thomas Adams, now lord major of that famous city / by Simeon Ash ... Ashe, Simeon, d. 1662.
[4], 27 p.
Printed by G. Miller for Edward Brewster ..., London : 1645.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
Edward Brewster
G. Miller
